name: Chapter III
tooltip:
Chapter III

Bring pages 18, 20, 21and 24 of Nesingwary's The Green Hills of Stranglethorn to Barnil Stonepot in order to complete Chapter III.

Requirements:
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 18
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 20
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 21
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 24
